about_the_game:
Ignite your rocketship engines and zoom your way through the caves of tiltfire.
Fly around tight corners and blast AI drones in this fast paced top-down shooter.

In tiltfire you control a rocketship through linear 2D caves,
which are riddled with obstacles and hostile AI controlled drones.
In every cave your goal is to reach the teleporter, which teleports you to the next cave.
The game keeps track of your record time per stage.

Simple, yet convincing physics makes flying in tiltfire a joyride.

Features:

  • Dead simple, buttery smooth controls.
  • Over 60 meticulously designed levels spanning across 12 stages.
  • High explosive missiles, homing missiles, laser guns, fast firing machine guns.
  • Dodge spinning saw blades and laser traps.
  • You get to choose from 3 different guns which vary in style.
  • Different types of drones which use different guns.
  • An electronic soundtrack, which suits the look and feel of the game.

Created by a solo developer.

Tiltfire Original Soundtrack by Dry Valley and \aleph_{0}.

name: tiltfire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
